fields.request: Manual QA: Verify admin dashboard node count badge
fields.request_details:
1. Sign in to the Django admin and open /admin/.
2. Confirm the Nodes â†’ Nodes row shows a numeric badge immediately to the left of the rules check text indicating the total nodes known to this deployment.
3. Add or remove a Node record and refresh to ensure the badge updates while the rule status text remains to the right.
